title: Three killed as rival clans clash in Pishin - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
QUETTA: Three people, including two brothers, were killed in an armed clash in the Saranan area of Pishin district on Thursday.

The incident occurred near Killi Gul Baran, where rival groups opened fire on each other due to an old enmity. The clash resulted in the deaths of two brothers, Niamatullah and Naqeebullah. Another man, identified as Muhammad Dawood from the opposing group, was also killed.

Levies personnel shifted the bodies to District Teaching Hospital in Pishin. They were later sent to Quetta for post-mortem examination.

Published in Dawn, May 30th, 2025
